thread.title: Duke's Jayson Tatum declares for NBA Draft, will sign with an agent
thread.title_full: Duke's Jayson Tatum declares for NBA Draft, will sign with an agent

author: Kyle Boone
title: Duke's Jayson Tatum declares for NBA Draft, will sign with an agent
text:
Duke's Jayson Tatum declares for NBA Draft, will sign with an agent One season at Duke is enough for Jayson Tatum 3m ago • 1 min read 
Download the CBS Sports App today and get instant tournament news and alerts, plus get the latest picks and upsets from SportsLine! SportsLine 
Duke freshman Jayson Tatum will declare for the NBA Draft and sign with an agent, the program announced in a statement on Wednesday. 
“I have absolutely loved coaching Jayson Tatum,” Duke coach Mike Krzyzewski said. “His skill set and work ethic will make him a star in the NBA . Whichever team selects him will be getting a humble, thoughtful and talented young man who we are proud to call a member of the Duke basketball brotherhood.” 
At 6-foot-8 and the ability to score it from anywhere on the floor, Tatum will be a hot commodity in the draft. He is a versatile forward who played both small forward and power forward last season. CBS Sports experts Gary Parrish and Howard Megdal both project he will be a top-10 pick in the upcoming draft. Tatum averaged 16.8 points and 7.3 rebounds per game for the Blue Devils this season.
